title: Dream Jungle Villa, Tulum, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Spectacular!  This private and stylish, 3BR home is brand new and waiting for you to enjoy today!  Live in the peace & quiet of the jungle, yet only 15-20 minutes from Tulum and Puerto Aventuras.  Selva Secreta is a new residential community with great ecological values.  The house is located only 2.5kms from the 307 federal highway passing a gorgeous little cenote, known only to locals, along the way.  If you enjoy cenotes, you have over a dozen to explore, all inside 20 minutes or less, and Xcacel Beach is a short 3miles by golf cart, side by side, bicycle, e-bike, dirt bike… whatever moves you!\r\rYou might not yet understand the importance of one of the greatest features of the house, but consistent & reliable high speed internet like this (especially in the jungle), is really something to appreciate.  The house itself is finished in a very classy and simple Tulum style, both finishes and furnishings.  From the chukum finishes, the wide open, inside-out living spaces and simple furnishings, the house is very inviting and needs nothing for your family to enjoy or for you to host an incredible party.   Yes, it’s sold fully furnished, and the internet stays too!\r\rThe house really has 2 master bedrooms with their own ensuite baths (double sinks in each), walk through closets, king bed and pool or jungle views.  The main floor master even has a private outdoor shower. The 3rd bedroom is massive, also with a great ensuite, and with so many windows in each of the rooms, you always have great natural light and a terrific view of the jungle.  Heads up, you might have the occasional spider monkey looking in on you.  You also have a half bath off the main living area and another on the roof terrace.\r\rAs beautiful and functional as the interior of this house is, it’s the outside spaces that make it truly something to enjoy.  With a gorgeous pool, an outdoor jungle shower, and great terrace space on the main level, open up all the windows and you really extend your living space blurring the lines between inside and out.  But that rooftop!  With another pool, lounge area, dining area and built-in grill.  I can’t help but picture a barbecue every weekend up there with family and friends, or a romantic night with a glass of wine under the stars in the jungle of Chemuyil.  \r\rCheck out our virtual tour if you copy and paste this link into your browser - https://youriguide.com/casa_amaia_chemuyil_roo_mx and our walk-though video tour on YouTube here - https://youtu.be/KvgAWkSuGDkContact us to schedule your visit soon, this house won’t last long!  \r\r** The listing price of this home is $8,500,000 MX pesos, the price of $490,000 reflects the exchange rate on the day of posting.
        
Find out more about this property.
Request details here

title: RAR72 – Villa Encantamar – Beautiful 4 Bedroom/6 Bath Ocean Front Home – Puerto Morelos, Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Welcome to Villa Encantamar, a secluded haven nestled within the exclusive oceanfront enclave of Punta Caracol, just north of the picturesque village of Puerto Morelos. This enchanting retreat offers a unique blend of laid back luxury, exclusivity, remoteness, and pristine Caribbean beauty.Setting the sceneAs you approach this home, a captivating outdoor promenade welcomes you. The lush tropical surroundings include a stunning pool area surrounded by swaying palms, palapas and inviting lounge chairs. Adjacent to this oasis is a new, palapa-covered outdoor kitchen, enhancing the al fresco experience.  Imagine gathering here with family and friends, making unforgettable memories of long beach days and longer Caribbean nights.WelcomeA majestic arched entryway leads to an open atrium featuring a brick cupola, framing a breathtaking view of the expansive Caribbean beyond. The heart of the home, the open floor plan seamlessly integrates the kitchen, dining, and living areas, providing an expansive space embraced by breathtaking views of the Caribbean through floor-to-ceiling glass sliders. This panoramic view serves as the focal point, offering an ever-changing canvas of the sparkling waters and endless horizons.The chef in the family will love the ease of working in this kitchen, which boasts artisan-crafted custom wood cabinetry, complemented by an inviting island perfect for casual dining or entertaining. A generously sized wood dining table harmonizes with the natural elements, inviting gatherings and creating a focal point for shared meals against the backdrop of the ocean's beauty.Relaxation takes center stage in the thoughtfully designed living area, exuding a blend of coastal comfort and style. The space is curated with a modern Mexican design, marrying the elegance of contemporary aesthetics with the laid-back ambiance of the seaside. With its tasteful furnishings and soothing tones, this area is a haven for both unwinding and entertaining.Whether you're enjoying a culinary adventure in the well-appointed kitchen, gathering for a meal with loved ones, or simply basking in the serenity of the ocean vista from the living area, this open floor plan embodies the epitome of luxury and relaxation in a uniquely modern Mexican style.The ground floor also boasts a utility room, a guest bath and two spacious bedrooms, each offering unique connections to the outdoors.SanctuaryFirst you've got the spacious primary sanctuary - get away from it all in this gorgeous space, complete with floor to ceiling glass sliders framing the ever changing Caribbean, a king size bed, abundant custom built in closet space, and an en suite bath. Go to sleep to the sounds of the waves and rustling palms just outside your door. Wake up to the magnificent spectacle of Caribbean sunrises painting the skies with a palette of colors, while the gentle sounds of the waves create a natural melody, inviting you to embrace the day with a renewed sense of tranquility.Just off the kitchen area you'll find another bedroom (or office, or TV room - the possibilities are endless!) with unique glass walls.  Natural light floods the room while the glass walls provide an uninterrupted view of the vibrant outdoor scenery.  The tranquility of the tropical gardens and the glistening allure of the pool create an ever-changing mural, bringing nature's beauty inside.  Step outside the slider, and you're in the palapa covered outdoor living space.Ascending to the upper level, you'll find two more large bedrooms - both with killer views, balconies overlooking the sea and en-suite bathrooms.  A common area overlooks both the entry atrium and the beach, creating a perfect space for relaxation - think TV or game room, or just a gorgeous reading nook.On top of it allUp one more level and you're in for a real treat - the cherry on top, as they say - a sprawling rooftop oasis adorned with a massive palapa. This to-die-for open-air space features a dining area, hot tub, bar, and lounge zone, inviting you to host and entertain under the starlit skies, with the Caribbean Sea as your panoramic backdrop.  A bathroom and outdoor shower round out the rooftop experience.Villa Encantamar is not just a home; it's a lifestyle. Priced at $1,150,000 USD, this residence balances luxury with comfort, offering an authentic living experience where sandy feet, casual gatherings, and the awe-inspiring beauty of Caribbean sunrises and sunsets take center stage. Experience the tranquility of private, secure living, just a short 15-minute drive from the delightful shops and restaurants of Puerto Morelos.Puerto MorelosKnown as the hidden gem of the Mayan Riviera, Puerto Morelos delights with its wide, white beaches, vibrant town center, lively restaurant scene, charming shops and local artisan markets.  While it is just 20 minutes south of the Cancun International Airport and approximately 25 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, the vibe in Puerto Morelos is a million miles away from these tourist towns.Easy access to the Cancun Airport and the rest of the Riviera Maya and Yucatan Peninsula has made Puerto Morelos an ideal spot for travelers.  And in the past 6 years investment in Puerto Morelos has soared, with investors betting on the continued desire for an authentic fishing village with a laid back vibe (and amazing restaurant scene!) close to a major international airport. Speculation has paid off, and property values continue to climb, along with the opportunity to generate rental income if you're not planning to use your home year round.Although Puerto Morelos is no longer completely under the radar, the charm remains.  When you visit, you’ll know!Property Features:Beautiful home with 4 bedrooms/6 baths1200 square meter/12,916.69 square feet lot20 meters/66 feet BEACHFRONT525.39 square meters/5655 square feet of constructionPrimary suite on ground level - walk out to the beach!Palapa covered outdoor kitchen/lounge area next to the poolPool and beautiful pool deckFully FurnishedAir Conditioned ThroughoutPalapa covered roof terrace with hot tub , outdoor kitchen, dining area, lounge area, bathroom and showerUtility buildingOff Street ParkingSeawallInternetSecurity System15 minute drive from Puerto Morelos, 15 minutes from the Cancun International Airport

title: 3BR Beachfront, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Here is your opportunity to own your dream, beachfront, Caribbean beach property.  With views to the fabulous beachfront pool to the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea beyond, and only steps to the world famous Quinta Avenida (5th Ave), it's hard to imagine a better location.  In fact, it's an iconic building we're talking about, the name El Faro translates to The Lighthouse and to see the building from the beach, you'll understand why.  And doesn't the idea of a lighthouse on a beach in the Mexican Caribbean evoke some sense of wonder and adventure?  This could be your famliy's next big adventure!Owning a home in Mexico can be a lot of work and there are so many things you can worry about.  Owning a property in El Faro is one of very few developments where you have 24/7 concierge in a beautiful lobby, 24/7 security, full time maintenance staff, property management of your choice, meaning you have very little to worry about!  I have been showing condos for sale in El Faro for 8+ years and still, each time I come in, I need to leave my ID at the desk.  They take owners and guests security & privacy very seriously. Walking into this property, you'll be immediately drawn to the the views through your living room windows.  All you see is water, from the pool to the Sea.  Drop your bags and get out there!  Your first 2 bedrooms are equipped with a twin and a queen bed, with one of the bedrooms having direct access to the 2nd bathroom.  All 3 bedrooms are equipped with plenty of closet space, the kitchen is fully equipped, including a dishwasher aaand incredible pool and ocean views.  The property is sold turnkey, fully equipped and furnished, all you need is what you can carry in your suitcase.  The master bedroom has pool and ocean views from your bed, the ensuite is equipped with double sinks a tub and a walk-in shower plus you even have in suite laundry.  The floors and showers throughout are all marble with marble vanity tops in the bathrooms and granite kitchen countertops.  All of the windows and doors are hurricane resistant and act as great sound barrier too if you need a break from all of the fun happening in the pool.New to the market and want to learn how to purchase real estate in Mexico as a foreigner, let us know, we'll be happy to advise.  Haven't heard of the exponential growth of the area, I'd love to tell you all about it!  Think this is the one and want to schedule your private tour, send us a message and we'd be happy to arrange it!
USD & MXP value shown are from day of posting, subject to change

Find out more about this property.
Request details here

title: Penthouse Luxury, Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Quinta Luna Paradise in Puerto AventurasDiscover the epitome of luxury living at Quinta Luna, meticulously maintained and ideally situated in Puerto Aventuras. Enjoy direct access to the sea and lagoon for activities like swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, or paddle boarding. Relax by the pristine common area pool or take a short golf cart ride to the beach club, shops, and restaurants just minutes away.There is so much that make this property spectacular, of course #1 is The Views! But the location, the layout, the separate studio apartment, the garage, the marble flooring, the brick ceiling details, the terrace, the new appliances, and of course the views!First off, this 3BR penthouse condo includes a garage space and a studio apartment, suitable for single living, an owner’s suite, housekeeping suite or can be used as a vacation rental. Absolute bonus spaces, both of these. The biggest draw back to condo living in Puerto Aventuras is the lack of storage, and here you have plenty.The real highlight of this penthouse condo is the wrap-around terrace, but each of the 3 bedrooms is adorned with gorgeous brick ceilings, each has their own closets and ensuites, of course the master bedroom has an incredible, Roman-like, massive shower, easily the stuff made for emperors! You can access the giant terrace from 2 of the 3 bedrooms and each terrace space feels cozy and private.The kitchen also boasts a beautiful brick ceiling, loads of work space and brand new appliances. Enjoy the photos and the walkthrough video tour, then call or message us to schedule your tour and discuss how to make an offer on this special property.Key Features:Backup diesel generatorNew elevatorGolf cart charging stationsOn-site administration and experienced staffAbundant reserve fundExquisite Amenities:Largest Beach Front property in Puerto AventurasInfinity pool with a shallow end for kidsSaltwater lagoon for swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, and paddle boardingFitness center15-minute walk (or 4-minute golf cart ride) to the village center and Puerto Aventuras Beach ClubPuerto Aventuras Highlights:Gated community, 1 hour from Cancun International AirportClose proximity to Tulum International Airport, Playa del Carmen, and TulumInternational, beachfront, marina, and golf communityTom Lehman-designed golf courses, fishing, tennis, and pickleballFull-service marina, 1st class beach club, world-class snorkeling, and scuba divingOver 20 restaurants within walking or golf cart distancePrime Location:Surrounded by premium golf courses, adventure parks (Xcaret, XelHa, Rio Secreto), and moreAbundant opportunities for snorkeling and scuba diving in cenotes or the Caribbean SeaReady to make Quinta Luna your paradise? Contact us for a private showing and let us guide you through the process of purchasing your dream property in this coastal haven.Note: USD & MXP values are based on the day of posting and subject to change.

title: Ocean View Beach Front Apartment 3 Bedroom Cancún, Quintana Roo, Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
"Are you looking for a place to relax and enjoy the beauty of the Mexican Caribbean? Look no further! This luxurious condominium is located in the beautiful coastal area of Playa Mujeres, in the municipality of Isla Mujeres, but not on the island itself. This area is known for its beauty and virginity, with white sandy beaches and crystal clear waters.
Imagine waking up every morning to the sound of the waves and the fresh breeze on your face. Here, you can enjoy the comfort of your own unit while relaxing on one of the luxury beds under the sun. And if you fancy a delicious cocktail, you don’t have to go far: the beach club is right next door, offering signature drinks and stunning sea views.

But that’s not all: this condominium is also close to all the amenities and attractions that Playa Mujeres has to offer. From restaurants to shops and water activities, there is something for everyone in this beautiful coastal area.

Don’t wait any longer: buy your unit today and start enjoying life in paradise! title: PiedraAzul, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Condo for sale near the beach and 5th AvenueThis studio condo for sale at Piedra Azul features an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Playa del Carmen. The condo building is located just steps from world-famous 5th Avenue and another minute to the beach. Many of the city's best restaurants, beach clubs, and the Cozumel ferry are all just a short walk away. This is one of the best locations in the city and attracts a steady stream of vacation renters, ensuring a healthy return on your investment for many years to come.This sun-filled studio condo is perfect for vacation rentals or as your own home in paradise. It features a spacious open floor plan and gets tons of natural light. It has an equipped kitchenette, a sitting area, and a sleeping area with a king size bed and a bedroom entertainment center with lots of closet space. It opens out onto a private balcony with city views. This is a lovely spot to enjoy coffee in the morning or an evening glass of wine. This condo has tile floors and top-quality finishes that are durable and easy to maintain. It is being offered for sale fully furnished and ready for you to make it your own.You and your guests will love the incredible ocean view rooftop with an infinity pool, a sundeck, and a covered lounge area. The condo building has a gym, a laundry room, and elevator access. It is close to public transportation stops, grocery stores, restaurants, and a multi-sport complex with a running track, basketball courts, and more. This area also offers reliable high-speed internet access.This condo is perfect for people who want an affordable apartment close to the beach or a profitable vacation rental. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.

open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Welcome to an exquisite modern masterpiece with breathtaking marina views, located in the prestigious community of Puerto Cancun. This luxurious residence is meticulously designed to offer the epitome of contemporary living, with a variety of exceptional features and amenities throughout its multiple levels.4 Bedrooms / 4 ½ BathroomsAdditional maid's quarters with en-suite bath and separate entrance.Parking for 3 vehiclesLaundry roomStorage room251 m2 of land / 2702 sq. ft. - 558 m2 / 6006 sq. ft. of constructionFirst floor: Upon entering the grand foyer, you will be greeted by a spacious open concept design that seamlessly connects the living room, dining room and state-of-the-art kitchen. Designed for functionality and elegance, the second floor also houses a cozy reception area, perfect for welcoming guests. In addition, a convenient half-bathroom is located nearby. For added convenience, the property includes covered parking for up to three vehicles, ensuring ample space for residents and visitors alike. A maid's room with en-suite bathroom offers comfortable accommodation for domestic staff. A fully equipped laundry and storage area complete this level, meeting the practical needs of modern living.Second floor: As you ascend the staircase, you will discover the private quarters of the house. This floor features three spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom for maximum comfort and privacy. The rooms are carefully designed to provide a serene retreat, with abundant natural light and stunning views of the surrounding landscape.Second floor: Continuing your way upstairs, you will find a cozy TV room adjacent to a magnificent rooftop terrace. This versatile space serves as an idyllic setting for relaxation and entertaining, with ample space for lounging, dining and enjoying the sun. An additional convenient rooftop bathroom ensures maximum comfort for residents and guests.Third floor: The jewel of this exceptional residence is the expansive rooftop terrace, which offers panoramic views of the marina and beyond. Whether hosting outdoor gatherings or simply relaxing against the backdrop of breathtaking sunsets, this rooftop oasis offers the perfect setting to enjoy the best of coastal living.Additional Features: This distinguished home is equipped with a water softener and osmosis system, ensuring pristine water quality throughout the property. Outside, a stunning corner pool wraps around the residence, offering a refreshing escape from the tropical heat and a tranquil setting for outdoor relaxation.Puerto Cancun Lifestyle: Located within the exclusive community of Puerto Cancun, residents enjoy access to a variety of world-class amenities and unparalleled lifestyle offerings. From pristine beaches and championship golf courses to shopping and dining destinations, Puerto Cancun embodies the epitome of luxury coastal living. title: La Costa 5 Bedroom Condo, Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Superb penthouse condo for sale on the marina


This two-story waterfront condo features an unbeatable location on the marina in the exclusive gated residential resort community of Puerto Aventuras. Enjoy golf, tennis, sailing, yoga, snorkeling, and scuba diving, as well as access to world-class deep-sea fishing and water sports, all just steps from your door in this beautiful vacation condo. Puerto Aventuras is very much a community for couples or families—most of the restaurants close at 10pm and there are strict noise ordinances after 11pm.


This huge 5-bedroom, 4.5-bath penthouse is actually two separate units converted into one. It has a large living room with vaulted ceilings and a fully equipped kitchen with an island on the main floor. The master bedroom has a full wall of closet space and a luxurious master bath with separate his-and-her vanities. This condo has two enormous terraces with spectacular views of the marina and the tips of sailboat masts bobbing merrily in the distance. The furnished terrace on the top floor has a palapa-style thatched roof and the terrace on the lower level is fully enclosed with large windows. This condo is being offered for sale unfurnished but equipped with air conditioning and a washer and dryer.


The condominium complex has a beautiful communal pool area with sun loungers and landscaped tropical gardens. From here, it’s an easy walk into town for bars, restaurants, and other amenities, and an easy walk to the beach. This quiet seaside community is located about halfway between Playa del Carmen and Tulum and just over an hour drive from Cancun International Airport.


Perfect for people who want a Caribbean getaway for vacations, or even to retire to, this condo will bring many years of personal enjoyment while providing an excellent income if used as a vacation rental. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.

title: Loft Style Beach Condo for Sale in Playa del Carmen, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Ocean Plaza 7: Furnished loft-style beach Condo for Sale in Playa del Carmen\r\rFantastic two-bedroom condo for sale in Downtown Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico.\r\rThis furnished condo for sale in Playa del Carmen is located in Ocean Plaza, a boutique development of beachfront apartments with state-of-the-art design, breathtaking sights, and elegant & stylish features including marble floors and granite countertops. Ocean Plaza has an indoor swimming pool available to owners and tenants, an elevator, and 24/7 security. Click on "Virtual Tour" for a 2-minute preview of the property and see for yourself.\r\rAs the lucky new owner of this condo, you can relax on a beautiful balcony while holding your favorite drink. The condo boasts double-height ceilings in the living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, Wi-Fi, and A/C.\r\rImagine waking up to breathtaking dawn, seeing the magnificent turquoise Caribbean water, and feeling the clean white sand massage your feet while the sun warms you.\r\rThere is an astonishing selection of coffee shops, fashionable bars, gourmet restaurants, exclusive lounges, and fantastic shopping all around you! You can meet people from all around the world, creating a genuinely international atmosphere. As soon as the sun sets, you begin to move to the rhythms of the nightlife around you. People are always in the mood to party on the Playa, which has a very vibrant and exciting vibe. Nearby clubs and pubs provide a diverse range of music and entertainment, attracting a diverse group of individuals from around the world. Simply put, there is something for everyone!\r\rDo not hesitate to contact our specialists for more information about this condo for sale in Downtown Playa or schedule a showing.

title: La Sirena 2 bed PH, Akumal, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Gorgeous ocean view condo for sale Discover the joy of coastal living in this oceanfront condo on Half Moon Bay in the quiet community of North Akumal. The La Sirena complex is located right on the beach and just a few minutes away from the beautiful Yal-Ku Lagoon. A favorite spot for snorkelers, Akumal boasts an easily accessible reef system full of vibrant living coral and teaming with sea life. This tiny seaside village supports a full-service dive shop, a small grocery store, and a handful of cafes and restaurants with great food and live music.Spectacular ocean views fill this spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo, which gets great airflow and plenty of natural light. It features a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, a sun-filled living room, a dining area, and front and back terraces for appreciating the remarkable seaside in any weather. The large front terrace offers sweeping panoramic views of the palm-fringed Caribbean coastline and the back terraces overlook the courtyard. Plus, an interior window lets you enjoy ocean views from the primary bedroom as well! This condo has tile floors and top-quality finishes that are durable and easy to maintain. It is being offered for sale fully furnished and equipped with ceiling fans and air conditioning. La Sirena’s beautifully landscaped courtyard and community pool area is perfect for entertaining on hot days or laid-back evenings. Just steps away, you can lounge under a shady palapa on the beach or head out snorkeling, kayaking, or paddleboarding in the calm, clear waters of the bay. If your guests need help with anything, the building’s front desk is always available to answer questions.Perfect for people who want a Caribbean getaway for vacations, or even to retire to, this condo will bring many years of personal enjoyment while providing an excellent income if used for vacation rentals. Contact one of our friendly and knowledgeable agents today for more information.

title: Point 2 Condos: Prime Investment Studio at Ceren, Playa del Carmen, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Bienvenido a Ceren, donde la elegancia y el confort convergen en el corazón de Playa del Carmen. Te presentamos nuestro exclusivo estudio de 37m2, una joya arquitectónica completamente amueblada y equipada, a solo unos pasos de la icónica Quinta Avenida y de las cristalinas aguas del Mar Caribe.Este estudio, meticulosamente diseñado, refleja la esencia del lujo moderno. Cada rincón ha sido cuidadosamente planeado para ofrecer una experiencia de vida sofisticada e incomparable. Desde muebles elegantes hasta electrodomésticos de última generación, se ha considerado cada detalle para crear un espacio que rezuma estilo y comodidad.Estratégicamente ubicado, este estudio lo invita a sumergirse en la vibrante energía de la Quinta Avenida, con sus boutiques de alta gama, exquisitos restaurantes y animada vida nocturna. Además, estar a solo unos pasos del Mar Caribe te brinda la oportunidad de disfrutar de las playas de arena blanca y aguas cristalinas a tu conveniencia.Los residentes de Ceren no solo experimentan la proximidad a los encantos locales sino que también tienen acceso a servicios de clase mundial. Disfrute de áreas comunes exquisitamente diseñadas, una piscina infinita con vistas panorámicas al mar, un gimnasio totalmente equipado y servicios de conserjería que elevan su estilo de vida.No pierdas la oportunidad de asegurar tu espacio en este exclusivo estudio de Ceren. Sumérgete en un oasis de lujo y disfruta de la fusión perfecta de sofisticación urbana y serenidad costera. Contáctanos ahora y descubre el encanto único de vivir en Ceren.Visítenos en Point2Homes para obtener más información y comenzar su viaje hacia ser dueño de un pedazo de paraíso.

title: Caribbean Casa, Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Caribbean Casa is located on the beautiful island of Isla Mujeres, Mexico. A short scenic ferry ride from Cancun across turquoise waters will take you to the small but popular island. Caribbean Casa sits on the Malecon only a short walk away from pristine white sand beaches and amazing restaurants and shopping.
Caribbean Casa boasts incredible sea views both to the east and west and is where the owners have created and lived the phrase, ‘Mi Casa es Su Casa’ for friends, family and visiting renters for the last 13 years.
The Casa is comprised of two self-contained apartments, Casita Sonrisa, the ground floor apartment orienting to the east and Casita Isladise, the upper apartment that is on two levels with multiple balconies and a roof top with 360 degree views to take in the setting sun and the rising moon at the same time.
The interior décor is what you would come to expect with island charm from the hand-made Caribbean-colored tiles to the televera bathroom sinks, warm welcoming colors and a view that has you saying “Wow” from the moment you enter.
Casita Sonrisa is studio-style with an open floor plan, full kitchen, full bathroom and the most favorite part, the king bed which fully faces east where you can watch the rising sun without leaving your bed. They say you have to do that at least once, but after you experience it, you will want to do it every morning! This unit also has a balcony with a secured gate to the Malecon with ocean views that you will never tire of. The dipping pool will keep you cool and the hammock is a favorite for those afternoon siestas.
The upstairs apartment has main-floor living with the full kitchen, a full bathroom and living room with the first of 4 balconies, with this one facing east so you can start your day with a coffee and sunrise. Upstairs is the master bedroom, spanning the entire floor with another east facing balcony, which is a great spot to also take in the sunrise or find some mid-day shade and the favourite west-facing balcony which has a dipping pool and comfortable seating. From this balcony, take the stairs up to the rooftop where it will be a favorite Happy Hour spot to end your day taking in the setting sun and the rising moon and the 360 degree views. It is truly an experience that has kept guests returning year after year.
The owners have established a faithful and returning rental business, if one could call it that. The guests who return year after year treat the Casitas as their own, taking pride in their use and being respectful of the premises and staff.
This magical spot, located at the narrowest part of the island, offers ocean-views from both sides and is being sold fully furnished with all appliances, dishes, decor and linens. Intellectual Property and Marketing assets are also included.
Both units are frequented occupied and showings must be scheduled in advance. This is a must-see property!
Please visit the owner’s rental website at www.CaribbeanCasa.com to view more photos and see for yourself what makes this spot so special to the owners and guests alike. There are rentals confirmed for 2024/2025 which would need to be honored but there are also available dates for owner-use so it’s a nice mix of being able to use it yourself and then have it generate income when you’re not there.
Intellectual Property and Marketing assets Included:
Website
Client Contact List
Business Email Account

title: Private Rooftop Fully Turnkey 2 BR Aldea Zama Phase 2, Tulum, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
This 2 bedroom 2 bath condo is located in Phase 2 of Aldea Zama only a few minutes walk to the commercial area where all the restaurants, bars, and shops are.  It's closer to the beach than phase 1 and sits on a road that will eventually lead down to the beach where La Papaya Playa Project is.  This is a prime location and the builder, Tao is one of the most reliable and reputable developers in the Riviera Maya.  The Condo comes fully furnished and turnkey ready for you to enjoy and rent out.  The private rooftop area is great for enjoying the green views and light sea breezes.  

Amenities Include:

- Gym
- Multiple pools
- Jacuzzis
- Relaxation Area
- BBQ areas
- Assigned Parking Spot
- 24 Hour Security
- Fiber Optic Internet
- Turnkey

title: Ocean View- 2 Bed Middle floor - Double terrace, furnished, Akumal, Quintana Roo
open-house-label: No open houses are scheduled at this time.
Description:
Santamar consists of 117 units across 7 buildings. This development is located in Punta Sur Akumal, a few steps from a secluded beach that gives you direct and private access to the beautiful Caribbean Ocean. This is a lock off unit, meaning it has two points of entry from the hallway. This feature is great for renting one room with its bathroom or the other bedroom with kitchen and living room space. There are 7 buildings and 117 units in this development. Private terraces and gardens as well as common areas are also in this development. Each building has its own rooftop pool with ocean view.Amenities include:
10 Pools
Beach club 
Access to the beach 
BBQ areas
Gym 
Yoga area 


Attractions nearby
Tao Jungle Fish Beach club
Tao Wellness Center
Snorkeling off the reef 
Beached Bikini Beach Club and Bar
Akumal trail for hiking/walking

The development features lush vegetation, multiple pools, relaxation area, bbq grills, and a gym. This unit comes fully furnished with very good quality furniture. The balcony offers a sort of wrap-around style around the living room area, giving you space to sit out there, relax and enjoy the green views. 

There are a lot of attractions in Tulum that you can enjoy with family or friends such as:

Dining & Shopping: Tulum is in the heart of it all. Shop for unique art and gifts; eat Mexican food and seafood delicacies.
Coral Reef: Tulum is unparalleled for snorkeling and scuba diving.
Xel-Há & Akumal: All-inclusive park with snorkeling, cenotes, zip lines and restaurants all in one place.
Food Truck Park: Palma Central Food Truck Park is popular with locals and tourists. Enjoy live entertainment, markets and delicious food options.
Tulum National Park: Is an eco-archaeological site situated on Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula.
Tulum Ruins: Tulum is home to an ancient, walled Maya city perched on a cliff overlooking the Caribbean Sea.
Cenotes: Natural sinkholes created when limestone collapses into underground freshwater rivers.​
